import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;
import java.math.BigInteger;
class swert{

public static BigInteger sqrt(BigInteger b)
{
BigInteger TWO=BigInteger.valueOf(2);
BigInteger X=b; 
BigInteger Y=BigInteger.ONE;
while(X.compareTo(Y)!=0){
X=(X.add(Y)).divide(TWO);
Y=b.divide(X);}
return X;
}


public static void main(String args[])throws IOException{
//Scanner cons=new Scanner(System.in);
BufferedReader input=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
PrintWriter output=new PrintWriter(System.out,false);
int T;
String s;
StringBuilder res=new StringBuilder("");
BigInteger b;
//System.out.println("Lets test!");
T=Integer.parseInt(input.readLine());//cons.nextInt();
while(T-->0){
s=input.readLine();//cons.next();
b=new BigInteger(s);
res.append(sqrt(b).toString()).append("\n");}
//System.out.println(res);
output.println(res);
output.flush();
output.close();
}}
